prompt: What are the best free audio to text transcription tools?

hidden_queries: best free audio to text transcription tools
free automatic speech to text transcription software comparison
metadata.generated_search_query: best free audio to text transcription tools

sources.title: 12 Best Free Transcription Software Options for 2025
sources.snippet: Whether you're a journalist on a deadline, a researcher analyzing hours of audio, or a professional looking to streamline your workflow, the right tool can be a game-changer. But with countless options available, how do you find the best free transcription software that delivers accuracy without compromising your privacy or budget?

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are the most useful free tools for converting audio to text (good accuracy, minimal cost, practical limits noted): 1. Otter.ai (Web/App) – Popular free option for meetings/interviews; supports live and uploaded audio transcription with speaker labeling. Basic plan gives monthly minutes and upload limits. VoiceType+1
2. Google Docs – Voice Typing (Web) – Free built-in dictation in Google Docs; works in real time via mic. No file upload, but excellent for live speech. Lemonfox
3. Windows Voice Typing (Windows) – System-wide speech-to-text for any text field; no additional software needed on Windows 11/10. Lemonfox
4. Apple Dictation (Apple Devices) – Built into iPhone/iPad/Mac keyboards; free and works across apps. Great for quick note transcription. Lemonfox
5. Descript (Free Tier) – AI-powered audio/video transcription with editing; free plan gives limited monthly minutes. Good if you also want basic editing. Descript+1

sources.title: Free Audio to Text Converter - Transcribe Audio Online | AudioToText.com
sources.snippet: Convert audio to text online instantly with our 100% free AI transcription tool. Upload MP3, WAV, or any audio file and get accurate speech-to-text transcripts in minutes.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 6. AudioToText.com (Web) – Straight online upload and instant transcription without signup. Simple and free for basic file needs. AudioToText
7. Tactiq (Web) – Browser-based transcription tied to meetings (Zoom/Teams/Google Meet) with free monthly allowances. Tactiq
8. NoteGPT / Other AI Browser Tools – Emerging web tools that upload audio and generate transcripts (some free tiers, check current limits). NoteGPT
9. Google Gemini (Free Upload Feature) – Upload audio (short files) to generate a transcript via AI assistant for free. Limited to brief clips. Tom's Guide

Quick picks by need: Meeting/Interview transcription: Otter.ai or Tactiq Real-time dictation: Google Docs Voice Typing, Windows or Apple built-ins Simple file upload: AudioToText.com or Gemini uploads Creators/editing workflows: Descript (free tier) Notes/limits: Free tiers often cap minutes or file size. Accuracy varies with audio quality and accents — expect some cleanup after automatic transcription. screenapp.io
